subject: TestResults
msgSnippet: Hello, I ve got a suite of tests that interface with a live database. One of the tests stores/retrieves config data. I then use that config data to test
messageBody:
Hello,

I've got a suite of tests that interface with a live database.
One of the tests stores/retrieves config data.
I then use that config data to test components that make use of
that config data. How can I get the TestResults to be part of the
"parent" test case instead of a set of sub-results. I want the results
to show up in "THE" suite of tests and not sub-results. Any
suggestions?
Thanks -Tom

Example:

public void testGetLDAPSession()
for (int ii = 0; ii < numDirs; ii++) {
aSession = AFactory.getLDAPSession(dbSession,
getLDAP("subsysname" + ii));
assertNotNull(aSession);
// set the session to LDAP
setObject("session", aSession);
TestRunner oRunner = new TestRunner(System.out);
Test oTest = null;
boolean bCanUpdate = getBoolean("canUpdate" + ii);
if (bCanWrite) oTest = new TestSuite(TestLDAPSession.class);
else oTest = new TestSuite(TestLDAPSession.class.class);
try {
System.out.println("\nRunning LDAP " + ((bCanUpdate)
? "Read/Write " : "Read Only ")
+ "Session Test Suite...");
oRunner.run(oTest);
System.out.println("LDAP Test Suite Completed\n");
} catch(Exception e) {
System.out.println(e.getMessage());
System.exit(-2);
}
}
